title: Cost Optimization / Multi-Objective Audit
verdict: PASS - Two-level optimization: engine-level grid search (AdvancedCalculations) + algorithm-level metaheuristics (GA/PSO/SA/BO)

optimizeCuttingParameters.method: Grid search over speed/feed/depth with constraint enforcement
optimizeCuttingParameters.constraints: Speed/feed/depth/power bounds, Taylor tool life, surface finish

integration_path.engine_optimization: calcDispatcher routes cost_optimize action to AdvancedCalculations
integration_path.algorithm_optimization: calcDispatcher routes algorithm_calculate with algorithm_id to AlgorithmEngine
integration_path.intelligence_routing: intelligenceDispatcher routes algorithm_select to AlgorithmGatewayEngine for best-fit selection
